TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供用于在设计时计算和编辑资源表达式的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for evaluating and editing a resource expression at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自 类，并提供用于在设计时计算资源引用并将资源引用与控件属性关联的实现。The class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource reference with a control property at design time. 例如，可以将控件属性的值绑定到资源表达式 `Resources:submitText` ，这表示控件属性值是使用名为的资源设置的 `submitText` 。For example, you can bind the value of a control property to the resource expression `Resources:submitText`, which indicates that the control property value is set using the resource named `submitText`. 可视化设计器宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）使用 类为资源表达式指定资源类、键和设计器默认值，然后为所选资源表达式计算设计时呈现。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to specify a resource class, key, and designer default value for a resource expression, and then evaluate the selected resource expression for design-time rendering. 当您 在 "设计时属性" 网格中浏览控件的属性时，可视化设计器将显示一个对话框，用于设置为控件属性提供运行时值的表达式。When you browse the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the run-time value for a control property. 您可以选择基于表达式前缀列表的表达式类型。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 如果在列表中选择 " **资源** 表达式" 前缀，则可视化设计器会根据 资源表达式语法使用方法来设置、计算和转换表达式。When you select the **Resources** expression prefix in the list, the visual designer uses the methods to set, evaluate, and convert the expression based on the resource expression syntax. 可视化设计器使用计算的表达式结果来分配设计图面上呈现的控件属性值。The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 的基 属性 返回字符串 `Resources` 。The base property for a returns the string `Resources`. 类与表达式前缀和实现相关联 `Resources` 。The class is associated with the expression prefix `Resources` and the implementation. 方法对输入资源表达式求值。The method evaluates an input resource expression. 方法返回 用于选择资源名称、类和设计器默认值的实现，并从所选资源值形成资源表达式。The method returns the implementation that is used to select the resource name, class, and designer default value, and to form a resource expression from the selected resource values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用类将控件的属性绑定 到资源表达式 。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the property of a control to a resource expression using the class. 1. 在 Web 窗体项目中，将名为 Strings 的新资源文件添加到 App_LocalResources 目录。In a Web Forms project, add a new resource file named Strings.resx to the App_LocalResources directory. 2. 将名为 myLinkText 的字符串添加到字符串 .resx 资源文件，然后将值设置为控件的文本 。Add a string named myLinkText to the Strings.resx resource file, and then set the value to the text for a control. 例如，将 `myLinkText` 字符串值设置为 `This is a good link` 。For example, set the `myLinkText` string value to `This is a good link`. 3. 在 Web 窗体页中添加一个 控件。In a Web Forms page, add a control. 4. 对于 `Hyperlink` 控件，在 "属性" 中单击 " **表达式**"，然后单击省略号按钮 " (**...** ") 。For the `Hyperlink` control, in Properties, click **Expressions**, and then click the ellipsis button (**...**). 此时将显示 " `` **表达式**" 对话框。The ``**Expressions** dialog box appears. 5. 在 "可 **绑定属性**" 下，单击 " **文本**"，然后在 " **表达式类型** " 列表中输入 **资源**。Under **Bindable properties**, click **Text**, and then in the **Expression type** list, enter **Resources**. 类定义的资源表达式属性 随即出现。The resource expression properties that are defined by the class appear. 6. 在 " **表达式属性** " 下，将 " **ClassName** " 设置为 " **字符串**"，即已编译的字符串 .resx 资源文件的类名称，并将 **ResourceKey** 设置为 **myLinkText**，这是字符串中的字符串名称。Under **Expression Properties** set **ClassName** to **Strings**, which is the class name for the compiled Strings.resx resource file and set **ResourceKey** to **myLinkText**, which is the string name in Strings.resx. 可视化设计器使用 为属性分配资源表达式 `Text` 。The visual designer uses the to assign the resource expression for the `Text` property. 以下 .aspx 源显示使用资源表达式设置的属性值的示例。The following .aspx source shows an example of a property value that is set by using a resource expression. [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/CS/controlsusingexpressionscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/VB/controlsusingexpressionsvb.aspx#3)] [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#3)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是由基类和 属性设置为配置的 `Resources` 。A object is configured by the base class together with an property set to `Resources`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
override this.EvaluateExpression : string * obj * Type * IServiceProvider -> obj

param.name: expression
param.span: 不包含 表达式前缀。

span.span: does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 一个对象，它以 值的形式提供附加分析数据。

span.span: An object supplying additional parse data, in the form of a value.
The type of the control property.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 计算资源表达式并提供控件属性的设计时值。

span.span: Evaluates a resource expression and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 如果表达式计算成功，则为由计算的表达式字符串引用的对象；否则为 。

span.span: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string, if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查找由指定的资源 `expression` ，然后返回该资源。The method looks up the resource that is specified by `expression`, and then returns the resource. 可视化设计器使用 方法来计算资源表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供设计时值。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate a resource expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 在运行时，页分析器使用 相应实现的和方法 来计算表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供运行时值。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property. 可视化设计器使用 方法在设计时分析表达式字符串，然后使用 分析的表达式数据调用方法。The visual designer uses the method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the method with the parsed expression data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个资源表达式，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: A resource expression, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

summary.span: 返回使用输入表达式字符串和服务提供程序实现初始化的资源表达式编辑器表。

span.span: Returns a resource expression editor sheet that is initialized with the input expression string and service provider implementation.

returns.span: 一个 ，定义资源表达式属性。

span.span: A that defines the resource expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回资源表达式的表达式编辑器表实现。The method returns an expression editor sheet implementation for resource expressions. 可视化设计器宿主在其 "表达式" 对话框中使用表达式编辑器表。The visual designer host uses the expression editor sheet in its expressions dialog box.
